content:
That sounds like a wonderful plan! Soft blues are a great choice for conveying calmness, and blending and glazing techniques can add a beautiful sense of depth and luminosity to your piece. Organic shapes like gentle waves or clouds can also help create a sense of movement and flow, while still maintaining a calming atmosphere.

Remember to take your time and experiment with different techniques and colors. Don't be afraid to make mistakes or try new things – they can often lead to unexpected and exciting results!

As you work on your piece, try to stay present and focused on the emotions you're trying to convey. Let the music guide you, and allow yourself to get lost in the creative process.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, I'll let you get started on your artistic journey!

Remember to have fun and enjoy the process of creating. You got this!

P.S. If you'd like to share your progress or final piece with me, I'd love to see it and offer any feedback or encouragement!
